name: A2 Zygon
description:
A bullet hell with its own set of mechanics and unique bosses.
  • Enter the world of Vodos and fight demons and evil spirits.
  • Save the world from the evil clutches of the mad wizard Osilis.
  • Play as one of two characters with their own unique strengths.

But this is more than just your ordinary bullet hell.
  • Upgrade your spell abilities and increase your health as you progress.
  • In story mode, Your progress gets saved and you can retry bosses without having to restart the entire level.
  • Encounter unique and interesting bosses, with dialog that changes based on how you play.
  • Choose between an easy or hard route in story mode.
  • Play challenge levels, which are more difficult and have their own side story.
  • Collect cards that are chock-full of lore and useful hints.
  • Uncover dark secrets that will shake your moral fortitude.
  • Gameplay oriented, with fewer distractions and gimmicks than most other shoot-em-ups.
  • No curving bullets or screen shaking while dodging bullets.
  • Retro themed graphics, reminiscent of classic game consoles.
  • Has a killer soundtrack with both 8-bit and modern versions.

Magic has a purpose.
You can be set on fire, frozen, cursed, and more.

Warning: This game has flashing lights and special effects that may be harmful to you if you have photosensitive epilepsy or a similar condition.

Enjoy!
